name: Facepunch Thin Footer
description:
Tweaks the footer to be thinner. 

I personally think it's too big as default so I thought why not change some shit. 

This does very little though.
additional_info: When installed, make sure you click on Edit on the style, then on the bottom select URLs on the domain and to the right of it insert 'facepunch.com' without quotes, click add and save (to the upper left).
